title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same features as Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM or embedder in chains.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, rag, users, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; supports chat, embeddings, model ops and streaming.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template combining Ollama embeddings + ChromaDB + Streamlit UI.

title: chatd
summary: Lightweight desktop chat client for Ollama models; stores history in SQLite.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS-Code extension that turns Ollama into a free local GitHub Copilot.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and persistence support.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform Flutter GUI for chatting with Ollama models on desktop/mobile.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Feature-rich CLI wrapper (fzf picker, batch prompts, chat logs, model stats).

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama team; use local models as Generator or Embedder.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that answers questions using any Ollama model; slash commands & threads.

title: ollama-nim-client
summary: Pure Nim client for Ollama REST API with async and streaming support.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate wrapping Ollama REST API; supports chat, embed, pull.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with fluent API and built-in dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama services inside CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot that uses Ollama for on-demand LLM answers; supports threads and app mentions.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Community-curated collection of Modelfiles and tips for running niche models in Ollama.
